item.title: Networking Basics: Understanding Switches, Routers, Gateways, Subnets, Firewalls & DMZs
item.category: "Networking" , "IT Infrastructure" , "Network Security" , "Network Architecture" , "Cybersecurity" , "Data Communication" , "Information Technology" , "IT Fundamentals" , "Network Management" , "Internet Connectivity"
item.description: Discover the fundamentals of networking components and their significance in building reliable and secure networks, including switches, routers, gateways, subnets, firewalls, and DMZs.
